page.title: 12LLANELWEDD VILLAGE
page.content: Llanelwedd is a small village one mile outside Builth Wells. There is quite a large church and a Primary School with about 60 pupils.In the school grounds,there is a large new Community Hall called Jubilee Hall where many dances are held and clubs and societies meet regularly.Nearby is a very large quarry which can be seen for miles. Llanelwedd is famous for being the home of the Royal Welsh Show for four days every year.The showground employs quite a large number of people and is used for a number of other events during the year such as dog shows and sheep sales. There is a small council estate near the school as well as a few older houses. Just in front of the council houses is a small field where swings and a few other play-things for children have been erected.
